Description:
Homzmart is an end to end community that connects home professionals with homeowners who can browse home designs, furniture, accessories and products and also can find reviews, referring professionals, take advice from professionals and read articles about home improvement.Defining and prioritizing product roadmap and features
Lead cross-functional teams to solve for complex problems and determine the scope
Conducting market research to gather customer insights and understand market trends
Working with cross-functional teams including engineering, design, sales, and marketing to bring products to market
Managing the entire product lifecycle, from concept to launch and post-launch analysis
Representing the product internally and externally, including leading product demonstrations and presentations to business stakeholdersBachelor's or Master's degree
5-7 years of experience in technical project management, with a proven track record of delivering complex projects
Strong understanding of the product development process
Excellent interpersonal, and communication skills [English & Arabic]
Ability to navigate a fast-paced and rapidly evolving environment
Experience working with cross-functional teams in a highly matrixed organizationJob Details
